title: The Future Of Fitness Beyond The Pandemic
itunes:title: The Future Of Fitness Beyond The Pandemic
description:
Carl Daikeler, Co-Founder, Chairman, and CEO of The Beachbody Company, discusses the company's listing day and the future of fitness. Jonathan Carson, CEO & Founder of Stretto, talks the eviction moratorium and bankruptcy filings during the pandemic. Gil Borok, President and CEO of Colliers U.S., discusses office real estate and returning to work. Meltem Demirors, Chief Strategy Officer for CoinShares, talks crypto. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller. (Kailey Leinz fills in for Matt Miller)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
